snippet.title: Overcooked! 2 - Kevin's Christmas Cracker Update
snippet.description:
Kevin's Christmas Cracker is a FREE update for Overcooked! 2 and is available now on Nintendo Switch, PS4, Steam and Xbox One!

More info here: https://bit.ly/OC2KevinsChristmasCracker

Official website: https://www.team17.com/games/overcooked-2/
Follow Overcooked! on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Overcookedgame
Like Overcooked on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/overcookedgame/
Follow Team17 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Team17Ltd
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/
Chat with us on Discord: http://discord.gg/team17

Kevin’s Christmas Cracker includes:
- Five Christmassy kitchens!
- Three sweet new recipes: Mince pies, Christmas pudding and hot chocolate!
- Two new chilly chefs – elf and snowman!
- Practice mode - unlimited time, unlimited orders. Cook as much as you like!
- Additional online features – support for 2 local players to play with or against 2 other local players over an online connection

If you haven't picked up Overcooked! 2 yet, it is available physically at retail and digitally at the following links:

Steam: http://bit.ly/Overcooked2Steam
Nintendo Switch: http://bit.ly/Overcooked2Switch
PS4: http://bit.ly/Overcooked2PS4
Xbox One: http://bit.ly/Overcooked2XboxOne



About Team17 Digital Ltd
Founded in 1990, Team17 Digital Limited is a leading international games label that hosts the Worms franchise, Aven Colony, The Escapists, Genesis Alpha One, Overcooked, Sword Legacy: Omen, Yoku’s Island Express, Yooka-Laylee and many more from developers around the world. Visit www.team17.com for more info.
